=== Night Tourism with Ubuntu Hungary ===

The Ubuntu Hungary team has worked to put together a couple nights of Night Tourism for UDS attendees.

==== Wednesday ====

'''Invisible Exhibition'''

Meet in the hotel lobby right after the last session. We will be leaving at 6:15 sharp to go to the <nowiki>[[http://www.lathatatlan.hu/en/|The Invisible Exhibition]]</nowiki>, last admittance is at 7PM.

!LoCo Directory entry: <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/team/949/detail/]]</nowiki>

''IMPORTANT: We will be purchasing tickets for this on Monday evening, so you MUST register with the LoCo directory by Monday afternoon to secure your ticket!''

After the Exhibition we will get dinner.

==== Thursday ====

Grab a quick dinner nearby and meet in the lobby at 7PM as the Hungarian team guides us through sights such as Budapest Castle and we wrap up the evening at some <nowiki>[[http://ruinpubs.com/|Ruin Pubs]]</nowiki>.

Questions? Contact <nowiki>[[Hajni]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[lyz|Elizabeth]]</nowiki>.
